explains: n. 磁性，磁力；磁学；吸引力
wordGroup: permanent magnetism 永磁；永久磁性

sentences.en: There is some powerful magnetism attached to a Scorpio.
sentences.cn: 天蝎座有强大的吸引力。

sentences.en: Other areas under investigation include magnetism, landmarks, coastlines, sonar, and even smells.
sentences.cn: 其他正在调查的领域包括磁性、地标、海岸线、声纳甚至气味。
